honors_and_awards.title: High Commendation, MUN
honors_and_awards.description: Won High Commendation in MUN organized by Christ inviting delegates from all 5 campuses of Christ. Accoladed with merit certificate, cash prize, and recognition.

honors_and_awards.title: BUSINESS QUIZ
honors_and_awards.description: Secured 2nd position in Inter-college fest CHRONOS hosted by Christ University with sophisticated three level business quiz, competing with 8+ colleges students securing 2nd position with a trophy, recognition and cash prize.

honors_and_awards.title: CAMPUS REPRESENTATIVE
honors_and_awards.description: I was chosen to represent my college at Christ University, Lavasa, Pune for Best Marketing team with my fellow classmate and a good friend. We were sent by Insititution, fully sponsored for fest INSPIRA'20. We not only learnt about marketing but interacted with our seniors from many different colleges which helped us providing useful insights for our future.
